code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookList=()=>{const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const fetchBooks=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get('/api/books');setBooks(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};const handleBuy=async bookId=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');await axios.post(`/api/users/books`,{bookId},{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setMessage('Book purchased!');}catch(err){console.error(err);setMessage('Error purchasing book');}};useEffect(()=>{fetchBooks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Book Store"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"books-grid",children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.image,alt:book.title,width:"100"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Author: ",book.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",book.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Genre: ",book.genre]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleBuy(book._id),children:"\uD83D\uDED2 Buy"})]},book._id))})]});};export default BookList;
